p: Onion fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS; 0.5, 5, 50 and 250 µg/mL) enhanced phagocytic activity in peritoneal exudates cells (PECs) in Wistar rats and cell proliferation or mitogenicity of splenocytes and thymocytes in BALB/c mice (Kumar et al. 2015). Lectin as an effective constituent of A. cepa also showed remarkable immunoprotective effects and elevated the levels of proinflammatory COX-2 and nitric oxide and expression of immunoregulatory cytokines TNF-α, IL-2, IL-12 and IFN-γ (Prasanna and Venkatesh 2015; Kumar and Venkatesh 2016).
